_header: As I went to kirk weeping
_description: An exercise in translation, with the original Latin — sixteen lines

DULCosViii10.First Lines:
As I went to þe kyrk wepondI met a nowld wyfe
                    crepond…
DULCosViii10.Last Lines:
…þe mone was lytmak ȝow me thys laten o
                    reyt
